node.name: children
node.rich_text:
i have created an generic Card component which defines the style of the card and now i can use it in any way
all three are same card comp inner element is changed
Benefit is if i just change background from black to red in Card component ex->
But it is tough to read so just change the name from innerContent to children and wrap like this
it will work the same way
in wrapper components whatever pass inside a component it comes as c
